text: 9.20 Apo 16.3, 18.18, 21.20-26 Juda binɨb mɨdebal nab ak mɨdɨl, God yɨl yelaŋ agɨl, kɨli pel anɨgɨpal okok tek gɨpin. Yad takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek ma gebin ak pen, binɨb takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak kɨdek gɨpal nab ak mɨdɨl, God yɨl yelaŋ agɨl, yad ayɨp wɨlɨkɨl mɨdon yɨp nɨgel, bɨ kɨli olap tek lup.
